channel.title: World of Warcraft question
channel.description:
I downloaded the world of warcraft exe file and installed the wotlk client. Does that mean that the wotlk client should have the wotlk expansion stuff? because when i tried to go to a certain area, it stopped me and said that i need the wotlk expansion.
(Incase you didnt know, wotlk = "Wrath of the Lich King")

item.title: World of Warcraft question
item.dc:creator: @Reisyukaku Reisyukaku
item.description:
@Reisyukaku wrote:

i realized that trial accounts cant use expansions… that was the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: World of Warcraft question
item.dc:creator: @Statik97 Statik97
item.description:
@Statik97 wrote:

Im pretty sure i know your problem. You downloaded the expansion, but did you put in the serial code from CD onto your account? If not, go to account management, on ( http://www.worldofwarcraft.com .) And type in your key there. Good luck mate… and sorry if im wrong and thats not your problem

Read full topic

item.title: World of Warcraft question
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I’m not sure but I think you need the other versions before playing Wrath of the Lich King

Read full topic
